name: Social Media Icon
author: webdzier

sections.description:
Social Media is a wordpress icon generator plugin. Create social icons. It is easy to use and easy to customize. You can create social group of buttons. We have 10 Themes of Icons with live preview. Create social icons in widget.

Using [Social_Media id=XX] shortcode, you can publish in any Page or Post in your WordPress sites.

Requirements

  • PHP 5 or later
  • WordPress installed

Social Icon Demo

  • Social Icon Demo: Live Demo

  • Get Pro Version: Buy Now

Translators

Please contribute to translate our plugin. Contact at webdzier(at)gmail(dot)com.

Plugin Admin Features

Plugin settings is very easy and user friendly.

If you have any question about Social Media Plugin, feel free to contact us : Plugin Support Forum .
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire social-media folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress admin.
  3. Add new group, Use [Social_Media id=652] shortcode to publish your Icon into any page or post.
  • Installation Video
sections.faq: Please use WordPress support forum to ask any query.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.2

  • Tested up to wp 5.8

  • Fixed issue

  • Fixed All Bugs

short_description: Create fantabulous easy social icons. Social Media is powerful plugin and easy to use. You can create different types of icons on your website.
